sourcesContent:
/* eslint-disable react-hooks/rules-of-hooks */ import { useContext } from "react"; import { useNavigate, Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { getData, deleteCart } from "../../Context/CartContext"; import Card from "react-bootstrap/Card"; const cart = () => { const cart = getData(); return(

Carrito de compras

{cart.length > 0 ? (

Carrito de compras

{cart.map(sale => (
Vendedor: {sale.vendedor.name} Vendedor: {sale.vendedor.surname}
Precio: {sale.price}
Cantidad: {sale.amount}
))}
Total
${cart.reduce((a, c) => a + c.price * c.quantity, 0)}
) : (
No hay productos en el carrito
)}

Total: {cart.reduce((total, cart) => total + cart.price * cart.quantity, 0)}

); }; export default cart;
